NK005(ca)016:0: dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i sgrub thabs gsang chen mchog gi
NK005(ca)016:1: myur lam sogs spyi la nye bar mkho ba'i zin
NK005(ca)016:2: bris dgos don rab gsal zhes bya ba bzhugs so
NK005(ca)016:3: // na mo gu ru de ba d+aa ki n+ai ye /
NK005(ca)016:4: 'dir gsang sngags snga 'gyur ba'i ring lugs sgrub sde
NK005(ca)016:5: chen po brgyad kyi nang tshan bdud rtsi yon tan
NK005(ca)016:6: gyi rgyud lung dang 'brel bar dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i
NK005(ca)016:7: sgrub thabs rtsa gsum so so la sbyor ba'i tshul
NK005(ca)016:8: mang du 'byung ba las gtso bo bka' brgyad rnam
NK005(ca)016:9: pa gsum gyi dgongs pa gung mthun o rgyan gter
NK005(ca)016:10: bdag gling pas mdzad pa'i gsang chen myur lam gyi
NK005(ca)016:11: phyag len legs par shes na thams cad kyi spyi
NK005(ca)016:13: de nyid gzhir byas pa'i gsal byed zin bris cung zad 'bri ba la gnyis /
NK005(ca)016:14: rnam gzhag mdo tsam bstan pa dang /
NK005(ca)016:15: nyer mkho'i lag len dang dmigs rim sogs kyi gsal byed do //
NK005(ca)016:17: myang gter bka' brgyad kyi bdud rtsi'i man ngag las /
NK005(ca)016:18: thams cad bdud rtsi'i sgrub chen bshad //
NK005(ca)016:19: bdud rtsi'i ngo bo nges tshig dang //
NK005(ca)016:20: dbye ba mthun dpe dgos pa'i ched //
NK005(ca)016:21: thabs dngos 'bras bu thob tshul lo //
NK005(ca)016:31: 'khor 'das thams cad chos kyi dbyings bzang ngan phyogs lhung bral ba'i klong du ro gcig cing /
NK005(ca)016:32: gdod ma nyid nas rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ni bdud rtsi'i ngo bo ste /
NK005(ca)016:34: srid gsum ye nas bdud rtsi lnga //
NK005(ca)016:35: ma bcos lhun grub rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NK005(ca)016:36: dug gsum srid gsum sku gsung thugs //
NK005(ca)016:37: ye nas bdud rtsi yin pa'i phyir //
NK005(ca)016:38: nges pa'i klong nas bka' stsal to //
NK005(ca)016:40: myang gter bdud rtsi'i man ngag las /
NK005(ca)016:41: dang po bdud rtsi'i ngo bo ni //
NK005(ca)016:42: rang byung gdod nas rnam dag pa'o //
NK005(ca)016:44: de ltar srid pa gsum gyis bsdus pa'i nyon mongs pa lnga dang /
NK005(ca)016:47: phung po lngar snang ba thams cad kyang /
NK005(ca)016:48: rigs lnga yab yum gyi rang bzhin can du thog ma nyid rnam par dag pas /
NK005(ca)016:50: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas //
NK005(ca)016:51: rang byung gdod nas rnam par dag /
NK005(ca)016:55: rig pa ye shes su rgyas 'debs pa'i rtsi yin pas na bdud rtsi ste /
NK005(ca)016:57: ma rig rnam rtog 'khrul pa'i bdud la /
NK005(ca)016:58: rig pa ye shes kyi rtsi brda don gyis 'debs pa'o //
NK005(ca)016:60: bdud ni bdag 'dzin rtog tshogs bcas rtsi ni rang rig mnyam pa nyid ces gsungs /
NK005(ca)016:61: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad ye shes chen por
NK005(ca)016:62: rgyas 'debs pa'i sman yin pas na chos sman zhes
NK005(ca)016:63: kyang bya ste / 'khor 'das chos kun ye shes
NK005(ca)016:64: sman brda brtags chos sman de spyad na nyon mongs
NK005(ca)016:65: dug rnams sman du 'gyur zhes gsungs /
NK005(ca)016:68: mtshon bya chos nyid don gyi bdud rtsi dang mtshon byed rtags kyi bdud rtsi'o zhes gsungs shing /
NK005(ca)016:73: sman bdud rtsi sogs sgras brjod rigs kyi sgo nas phye na du mar yod /
NK005(ca)016:76: lha'i bdud rtsis dug rnams 'joms pa'i bdud rtsi byed
NK005(ca)016:77: na ba shi gsos kyi sman du 'gyur ba bzhin
NK005(ca)016:78: du 'dis kyang dug lnga 'joms shing na ba shi
NK005(ca)016:79: gsos kyi sman du 'gyur ba'o zhes gsungs /
NK005(ca)016:82: mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub yon tan phun
NK005(ca)016:83: tshogs thob cing lha dang chos skyong mnyes par bya'o
NK005(ca)016:84: zhes gsungs / drug pa thabs dngos ni /
NK005(ca)016:85: sgrub gzhi khrol bu dang phye ma'i sman 'du bya ba /
NK005(ca)016:86: sgrub chos spyod pa dang byin gyis brlabs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sgom bzlas /
NK005(ca)016:87: bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu dngos grub kyi dga' ston spel ba /
NK005(ca)016:88: de rnams kyang sgrub pa'i yan lag sbyor dngos rjes
NK005(ca)016:89: gsum tshang ba'i sgo nas nyams su len pa ste
NK005(ca)016:90: / gzhung rtsa bar rgya cher gsungs pa ltar ro //
NK005(ca)016:91: bdun pa 'bras bu thob tshul ni rgyud las /
NK005(ca)016:93: yon tan mchog 'bras yongs su rdzogs //
NK005(ca)016:96: bla ma mchod na byin rlabs 'jug /
NK005(ca)016:97: yi dam mchod na dngos grub ster //
NK005(ca)016:98: bde gshegs mchod na thugs rje 'byung //
NK005(ca)016:99: mkha' 'gro mchod na lung lnga ston //
NK005(ca)016:100: sgrub pa po'am sus zos kyang //
NK005(ca)016:101: phyi yi nad gdon sdig sgrib sel //
NK005(ca)016:102: nang gi bskyed rim ting 'dzin gsal //
NK005(ca)016:103: gsang ba rang rig chos skur rtogs //
NK005(ca)016:104: dam tshig nyams chag thams cad skong //
NK005(ca)016:105: bcangs pas dus min 'chi ba bzlog /
NK005(ca)016:106: gdug pa'i dug kyang 'jil bar nus //
NK005(ca)016:107: bsregs pas gdon bgegs thams cad skrod //
NK005(ca)016:108: byugs pas nad gdon ma lus 'joms //
NK005(ca)016:110: 'di nyid sgrub pa'i gnas de yang //
NK005(ca)016:111: dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal mtshungs te //
NK005(ca)016:113: sa yul byin dang ldan par 'gyur //
NK005(ca)016:114: char chu 'bebs shing lo phyugs legs //
NK005(ca)016:115: gang du bsgrubs pa'i gnas de ru //
NK005(ca)016:117: 'di zos tshe yi dus byung yang //
NK005(ca)016:118: pho mo bzang ngan med pa ru //
NK005(ca)016:119: rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa la gnas //
NK005(ca)016:120: de phyir mchog gi dam rdzas so //
NK005(ca)016:122: tshe dang skong dang yid du 'ong //
NK005(ca)016:123: bgegs rnams zhi ba la sogs te //
NK005(ca)016:124: nad dang bral nas ci 'dod pa'i //
NK005(ca)016:125: yon tan rtsa brgyad 'dis thob bo //
NK005(ca)016:127: gnyis pa nyer ma kho'i zin bris la dang po lag len gyi gsal byed ni /
NK005(ca)016:128: ra swa ya na'i sgrub rdzas kyi gtso bo ni
NK005(ca)016:129: bdud rtsi lnga ste de la gzhung chen rnams nas
NK005(ca)016:130: re re la'ang sbas pa nang gi rtsa ba bzhi
NK005(ca)016:131: / mngon pa phyi'i rtsa ba bzhi /
NK005(ca)016:132: skyobs lnga sogs rgyas par gsungs kyang deng sang tshul ldan 'byung dka' bas /
NK005(ca)016:133: bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga ni gong ma rnams
NK005(ca)016:134: kyis bsgrubs pa'i chos sman sel med la phab rgyun
NK005(ca)016:135: 'dres pas chog par mdzad cing da lta ni gsar
NK005(ca)016:136: du gter nas byon pa tshad ldan kyang bzhugs bzhin
NK005(ca)016:137: pas de ka la gzhir byed /
NK005(ca)016:138: sman rtsa ba brgyad la nang gses dbye ba brgyad
NK005(ca)016:139: tshan lnga sogs gsungs pa las sman gyi dbang du
NK005(ca)016:140: byas pa / tsan dan smug po /
NK005(ca)016:147: shing tsh+wa rnams phyi'i rtsa ba brgyad de /
NK005(ca)016:148: de la m+au la pa ti gter chen gyis ma nu dang /
NK005(ca)016:149: rtse le sna tshogs rang grol gyis push+kara m+au la ste khams kyi ru rta la ngos bzung /
NK005(ca)016:150: gan+d+ha b+ha dra dri bzang spyi ming la 'jug kyang
NK005(ca)016:151: dgongs 'dus las tsan+dana lo mar gsungs pa ltar 'dir
NK005(ca)016:152: rgya shug lo ma la bzhed /
NK005(ca)016:153: sgrub pa lag len gyi rtsa ba brgyad la lnga
NK005(ca)016:154: tshan brgyad du gsungs pa'i nang tshan yon tan lnga
NK005(ca)016:171: sug smel te de rnams ni rtsa ba brgyad kyi sman du sbyar bar bya ba yin la /
NK005(ca)016:172: 'dir bzhi mnyam ni dri chen te /
NK005(ca)016:174: 'o ma'i ston mo sogs skyes pa'i //
NK005(ca)016:175: tsan+dana ser po yang dag bzung //
NK005(ca)016:176: zhes 'o ma sogs kha zas bzang pos bskyed pa'i
NK005(ca)016:177: dri chen nyid bdud rtsi mar khur bsgrub pa'i tshul
NK005(ca)016:178: 'og tu chu yur la drangs pa'i yur sor zam
NK005(ca)016:179: bkal ba'i khar sgyed bu btsugs te me btang /
NK005(ca)016:180: de'i khar rdza ma skyon med gtsang ma bkab /
NK005(ca)016:181: de'i khar rdza ma mthil khrol tshags ltar bug pa chung ngu mang po phug pa bzhag /
NK005(ca)016:182: de'i nang du dri chen ma rul ba 'byongs tsam blugs /
NK005(ca)016:183: kha dang rdza ma gnyis kyi bar mtshams su rlung mi 'chor bar bkag pas /
NK005(ca)016:184: ji zhig na stod kyi zil pa mthil du 'dzag
NK005(ca)016:185: nas khu ba 'khyil ba la a rag lta bu
NK005(ca)016:187: de tsam ma grub kyang dam tshig ma nyams shing
NK005(ca)016:188: rims dang dug sogs nad gzhi ngan pa can ma
NK005(ca)016:189: yin pa'i lang tsho dar ba'i dri chen nam //
NK005(ca)016:190: rtog pa che na skyes chen dam pa'i gsang chen
NK005(ca)016:191: rigs las phal pa mi btang ba skabs 'di dang
NK005(ca)016:193: phab gta' la yod pas kyang don tshang bya'o //
NK005(ca)016:195: du rush+ka dngos ni zur pa yin kyang /
NK005(ca)016:196: a gar nag po'i rtsa ba dri gzhan las bzang ba des tsha ba rung du mdzad /
NK005(ca)016:197: rtsa ba brgyad las gyes pa'i yan lag stong ni /
NK005(ca)016:198: spyir snang zhing srid pa'i rtsi bcud thams cad sman
NK005(ca)016:199: du sbyor bar gsungs pas rgya bal mon bod sogs
NK005(ca)016:200: nas byung ba'i sman sna ji tsam tshogs pa dang
NK005(ca)016:201: / rin po che'i rigs su gyur pa /
NK005(ca)016:202: mi dang 'dab chags sder chags ri dwags g.yung dwags
NK005(ca)016:203: chu gnas sa 'dzul rnams kyi sha khrag snying sna
NK005(ca)016:204: dbang po lnga / lnga tshan lnga /
NK005(ca)016:205: dkar mngar 'bru sna sogs sbyor du mi rung ba gang yang med pas gang 'dzoms bsags /
NK005(ca)016:206: gnas skabs dug rigs gtsos nus pa dri ro kha
NK005(ca)016:207: dog sha me tog gi spyang ki rnams spang byar
NK005(ca)016:208: bshad pa ltar sbyor ba mi bya /
NK005(ca)016:209: sman gang yang rgyud dang khungs dag la ma rul
NK005(ca)016:210: ba dang dri ro ma nyams pa gal che bas
NK005(ca)016:211: gang byung ci rnyed mi bya /
NK005(ca)016:212: khungs dag pa'i rten 'brel du gza' tshes bzang po
NK005(ca)016:213: la rgya bal gyi sman rnams de'i tshong pa'i cha
NK005(ca)016:214: lugs can gyis sman rnams ras dkar gyi khug mar
NK005(ca)016:215: khyer la sbyin bdag gis gser dngul gyi rin sprad
NK005(ca)016:216: nas nyo tshong byed pa'i tshul bya bar gsungs pa
NK005(ca)016:217: dang / bod sman rnams kyang me tog sogs dpyid sos /
NK005(ca)016:218: rtsa ba 'bras bu rnams ston dus nyar tshags dgos pa gzhir byas /
NK005(ca)016:219: rgyud las dpyid zla 'bring po dang ston zla tha
NK005(ca)016:220: chung gi tshes bco lnga la dmigs su gsungs shing
NK005(ca)016:221: / skabs der khye'u gtsang mas khrus dang lha la phyag byas nas tshol dgos par gsungs /
NK005(ca)016:222: rin po che mang du btang na gso rig gi
NK005(ca)016:223: gzhung las bshad pa ltar g.ya' phyi dug 'don tshad
NK005(ca)016:224: ldan thon na shin tu legs /
NK005(ca)016:225: mdor bsdus pad r+aag nal sogs shel rigs dang g.yu
NK005(ca)016:226: mu man mu tig sogs mi bzhu ba'i khams rnams
NK005(ca)016:227: thog mar hrob tsam brdungs te ras nang bstums /
NK005(ca)016:228: de rnams dang ljid mnyam pa'i ze tsh+wa /
NK005(ca)016:235: star bu bcas byis pa lo brgyad kyi dri chu'am /
NK005(ca)016:236: dge slong gtsang ma'i chu la btab ste lan gcig btso /
NK005(ca)016:237: de rjes chu gtsang la btso /
NK005(ca)016:238: de nas cang bzang po la btso /
NK005(ca)016:239: de nas chu gtsang gis yang yang bkru bshal bya /
NK005(ca)016:240: bzhu ba'i khams gser dngul zangs lcags rnams sing po
NK005(ca)016:241: lta bu'i skyur nang du btab nas g.ya' yang yang
NK005(ca)016:242: bcad / de nas chu tshan du btsos pa'i chu phyir 'pho //
NK005(ca)016:243: chu grang gis bshal ba mang du bya /
NK005(ca)016:244: sha sna mang du btang na'ang gso rig gi lag
NK005(ca)016:245: len ltar dug 'don ngar 'dogs grub na legs pa'i
NK005(ca)016:246: yan lag tu 'gyur zhing mi 'grub na bkru bshal
NK005(ca)016:247: legs par bya / sha sna sogs ma 'dzoms na
NK005(ca)016:248: btang snyoms ni mi rung ste zan la mi dang
NK005(ca)016:249: dud 'gro rnams kyi gzugs 'bur ma'am spar btab pa
NK005(ca)016:250: legs par bya / mang du 'chos / n+ri ljang gu las mi dang /
NK005(ca)016:251: su ser po las dud 'gro'i rigs brgya stong mang
NK005(ca)016:252: po gsal btab pa'i mthar de dag so so'i tshe
NK005(ca)016:253: zad pas las kyis shi ba'i phung po sha khrag
NK005(ca)016:254: tu dmigs la dam rdzas kyi rgyur sbyang ba gsang
NK005(ca)016:255: 'dus las bshad pa tsam ma chad pa gal che
NK005(ca)016:256: / sman gyi sbyar tshul gzhung 'di'i dkyus su bstan
NK005(ca)016:257: pa las lhag ma dgos kyang khams phyogs lta bur
NK005(ca)016:258: sman dkon zhing 'byor pa dman la bung mang 'dod
NK005(ca)016:259: / pa rnams kyis / gtso bo a ru ra la gzhi byed /
NK005(ca)016:260: ba ru skyu ru gnyis ha cang mang na ro la gnod pas de'i phyed cha tsam /
NK005(ca)016:262: a gar rigs sogs dri ro bzang po'i rigs mang na'ang skyon mi bskyed /
NK005(ca)016:263: sngo sman rigs mang na mi legs pa dang /
NK005(ca)016:265: rdo sman rigs 'dres tsam las mang po mi btang /
NK005(ca)016:266: bung skyed du ru rta dang /
NK005(ca)016:268: ram bu'i rtsa ba rnams cung mang tsam btang na
NK005(ca)016:269: ha cang skyon du mi 'gyur zhing ston dus kyi
NK005(ca)016:270: gro ma'i phye ma'ang phran bu bsrer btub /
NK005(ca)016:271: spyir sman kha dog dkar ba /
NK005(ca)016:274: ro mngar ba ska ba cung zad skyur ba /
NK005(ca)016:275: dri ngad sdug cing bzang ba rnams dpung bskyed du rung /
NK005(ca)016:276: de las ldog pa'i kha dog sngo ljang nag po dmar smug sogs dang /
NK005(ca)016:277: shing tsh+wa lta bu dri ngad che zhing mi zhim pa dang /
NK005(ca)016:278: khams la phog pa'i dri ma dug can /
NK005(ca)016:279: ro ha cang tsha ba kha ba skyur ba lan
NK005(ca)016:280: tsh+wa ba rnams nyung ngu las mang du mi btang
NK005(ca)016:281: / gla rtsi'ang dri thon tsam gyis chog /
NK005(ca)016:282: sman mang bar 'dod cing rgyu tshogs ma 'byor na
NK005(ca)016:283: 'bras chu la bkrus pa'i rtsam pa'am zhib chen dar
NK005(ca)016:284: tshags la drangs pa a ru dang bung mnyam tsam
NK005(ca)016:285: btang srol snang yang sman 'byor na de'ang dgos pa
NK005(ca)016:286: chung / sbyar zin pa'i kha dog ser po la
NK005(ca)016:287: dmar mdangs chags pa'i snum bag can n+aa gi dang
NK005(ca)016:288: bzang drug sogs kyi dri gtso bor bsnam zhing a
NK005(ca)016:289: ru gser mdog chang dang bsres pa lta bu'i ro
NK005(ca)016:290: chung / bro ba dgos / phyag len phal cher
NK005(ca)016:291: la chos sman smug po byed pa ltar na thog
NK005(ca)016:292: ma nas dmar po dang smug po'i rigs mang chog
NK005(ca)016:293: chung / bro ba dgos / / sman de thams
NK005(ca)016:294: cad kyang khrol sgrub skabs phyogs bzhi dbus lnga'i rigs
NK005(ca)016:295: so sor phye nas bzhag dgos pas 'di'i gzhung gsal
NK005(ca)016:296: ltar rigs dang dri ro kha dog sogs so sor
NK005(ca)016:297: chung / bro ba dgos / / phye / de'ang
NK005(ca)016:298: btags btsags nyin mang po longs khom med pas khrol
NK005(ca)016:299: bu sne tshang nyung bsdus re bzhag sman byings snga
NK005(ca)016:300: sor nas brdungs la dar tshags shin tu zhib mor
NK005(ca)016:301: chung / bro ba dgos / / phye / btsags
NK005(ca)016:302: / 'di dus rtsing zhad byung na brlan phog dus
NK005(ca)016:303: rtsa dang pags pa sogs zing zing por 'gyur bas
NK005(ca)016:304: chung / bro ba dgos / / phye / btsags
NK005(ca)016:305: / zhib dgos / sman phye rnams ras khug dkar
NK005(ca)016:306: ser dmar ljang sngon po lngar blugs nas phyogs bzhi
NK005(ca)016:307: dbus lnga'i thod par bkod pa'am /
NK005(ca)016:308: sman phyee shin tu mang na dbus dang phyogs bzhi
NK005(ca)016:309: mtshams brgyad kyi thod pa dgu por rigs dang kha
NK005(ca)016:310: dog so sor phyes pa gang shong blugs /
NK005(ca)016:311: ma shong ba rnams ka to ra shin tu chen
NK005(ca)016:312: po'i nang du brdal nas de nang thod pa rnams
NK005(ca)016:313: bkod pa'i khar sman khrol bu shog thum byas pa
NK005(ca)016:314: so sor bzhag la dar phyogs mdog gis kha 'gegs
NK005(ca)016:315: pa nyid phyag len bde bar snang /
NK005(ca)016:316: thod pa rnams kyang gzhung bshad mi 'byor yang mi
NK005(ca)016:317: thod dum bu bzhi pa phan chad dang mdog ngan
NK005(ca)016:318: grog sked sogs mtshan ngan min pa'i thod pa bzang
NK005(ca)016:319: po la so sor yin pa'i mos pa bya /
NK005(ca)016:320: byin rlabs kyi phab rgyun yang gter byon sel med kyi dga' rab /
NK005(ca)016:324: rje 'bangs nyer lnga sogs kyis bsgrubs pa'i chos sman
NK005(ca)016:325: rig 'dzin gong ma rnams kyi dam rdzas kyi rgyun
NK005(ca)016:327: deng sang gsar du byon pa rnams gtso bor byed
NK005(ca)016:328: pa las gsar rnying gi byin rten gang rnyed bsre
NK005(ca)016:329: ba'i rten 'dus lta bu byed pa ni dgos pa
NK005(ca)016:330: chung ngo // 'di skabs su gal che ba dkyil
NK005(ca)016:331: 'khor steng phub tshangs pa'i pho brang du grags pa
NK005(ca)016:332: la smin lugs su mdor bsdus kyi phyag len mdzad
NK005(ca)016:333: pa ni gzhung gsal ltar la /
NK005(ca)016:334: dgongs 'dus mkhan po rnams dang rat+na'i phyag bzhes kyi
NK005(ca)016:335: rgyun rnying ma phal mo che'i lugs srol dang rol
NK005(ca)016:336: rdor brag gter them med las kyang gal po cher
NK005(ca)016:337: bshad pa ltar de'i chas bsgrigs tshul /
NK005(ca)016:338: gter gzhung mang po'i gnad kyi zhal gdams mthun par
NK005(ca)016:339: 'byung ba'i don rig 'dzin brgyad pa'i phyag rgyun du
NK005(ca)016:340: / sgrub khang dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa'i yang thog tu
NK005(ca)016:341: shing ring btsugs pa'i rtse mor rnga ma dkar po
NK005(ca)016:342: / 'dogs / de 'og ku sha'i chun po gnyis
NK005(ca)016:343: rtse sprad du bcings pa'i gseb tu lha dbang brgya
NK005(ca)016:344: byin sku rgyab byang 'dod gsol bris pa la dmu
NK005(ca)016:345: thag dkar po btags pa sman gyi pho brang dang
NK005(ca)016:347: gi rgya mthong lta bur shing ku ru kha zhes
NK005(ca)016:348: rgya gram rtse sbrel gru bzhi'i dbyibs steng 'og rim
NK005(ca)016:349: pa bzhi mdzes chos bang rim gyi rnam par byas
NK005(ca)016:350: pa'i dang por lha chen brgyad /
NK005(ca)016:351: gnyis pa rgyu skar nyer brgyad /
NK005(ca)016:352: gsum par rtsi bcud lha mo bcu drug /
NK005(ca)016:353: bzhi par klu chen brgyad rnams sngags byang 'dod gsol bcas bkod /
NK005(ca)016:354: sku gzugs rnams kyang rgyas par grub na lder bzo
NK005(ca)016:355: gtsang ma'i nang gzhug rang rang gi snying po dang
NK005(ca)016:356: 'dod gsol bcug pa lding khri brtan por bzhag /
NK005(ca)016:357: gong 'og gnyis kyi zur brgyad la me long brgyad phyar /
NK005(ca)016:358: bris 'bur gang la'ang so sor bskyed bstim nan du bya bar gsungs pa ltar gal che zhing /
NK005(ca)016:359: rgyu skar la gtor 'bul dmigs su snang ba'ang tsaka gdugs dbub skabs nges par dgos /
NK005(ca)016:360: smin lugs phyag rgyun steng phub rgya gdugs kyi khongs
NK005(ca)016:361: su bsdu skabs kyang bcas 'di rnams tshang na dgos
NK005(ca)016:363: gdugs kyi yu ba la rnga dkar ku sha brgya byin gyi sku rnams bkod /
NK005(ca)016:364: sham bu'i phyogs mtshams brgyad kyi dang por lha chen brgyad /
NK005(ca)016:365: de 'og phyogs skar drug re dang mtshams skar re re /
NK005(ca)016:366: de 'og phyogs mtshams brgyad la rtsi bcud lha mo gnyis re /
NK005(ca)016:367: de 'og klu chen brgyad kyi tsakli bkod pa'am /
NK005(ca)016:368: 'di nyid mgron thabs kyi lha yin stabs gtso 'khor
NK005(ca)016:369: gyi go rim mi dgos pas shar ngos su tsakli
NK005(ca)016:370: bzhi'i dang por lha chen gnyis /
NK005(ca)016:371: gnyis par shar skar drug dang mtshams skar gcig /
NK005(ca)016:372: gsum par rtsi bcud lha mo bzhi /
NK005(ca)016:373: bzhi par klu chen gnyis bkod pa'i tsakli 'dogs /
NK005(ca)016:374: phyogs gzhan gsum la g.yas bskor du de ltar byas pas stabs bde la don tshang bar 'ong /
NK005(ca)016:375: tshangs pa bri tshul gzhung phal cher nas mi 'byung
NK005(ca)016:376: yang sman srung mgron gyi gtso bo yin pa ma
NK005(ca)016:377: zad tshangs pa'i pho brang zhes pa'i ming don dang
NK005(ca)016:379: bzang shing gi byang bu'i stod la /
NK005(ca)016:380: tshangs pa gdong bzhi gser mdog 'khor lo 'dzin cing ngang pa la gnas pa /
NK005(ca)016:381: smad du brgya byin dkar po pi wam bsgreng zhing
NK005(ca)016:382: rgyal po rol stabs kyis rin po che'i khri la
NK005(ca)016:383: bzhugs pa / gnyis ka dar dang rin po che'i rgyan ldan zhi zhing 'dzum pa bri /
NK005(ca)016:385: 'jig rten mes po tshangs pa dang lha'i dbang po
NK005(ca)016:386: brgya byin gyis bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa la
NK005(ca)016:387: bdud rtsi sman gyi dngos grub sogs 'dod don ma
NK005(ca)016:391: shar du dbang phyug nag po /
NK005(ca)016:395: nub tu tshogs bdag dkar po /
NK005(ca)016:398: gzhon nu gdong drug ljang gu ste /
NK005(ca)016:399: phyag g.yas thams cad bkra shis rdzas brgyad /
NK005(ca)016:400: g.yon rnams bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams pa /
NK005(ca)016:401: dar dang rin po ches brgyan pa /
NK005(ca)016:402: rol stabs kyis pad+ma la gnas pa'i rgyab tu srog yig rim bzhin /
NK005(ca)016:412: rgyu skar nye brgyad kyi shar skar bdun ni shar stod nas g.yas bskor du /
NK005(ca)016:413: smin drug ljang gu bum pa'i khri //
NK005(ca)016:414: snar ma dmar skya ba dkar khri //
NK005(ca)016:415: mgo ni nag po sha ba'i khri //
NK005(ca)016:416: lag ni ser po sbrul la zhon //
NK005(ca)016:417: nabs so ser po pad+ma'i gdan //
NK005(ca)016:418: rgyal ni ljang gu bum pa'i khri //
NK005(ca)016:419: skag ni dkar po bya rog khri //
NK005(ca)016:421: mchu ni ser po pad+ma'i dbus //
NK005(ca)016:422: bre ni ljang ser pad+ma'i gdan //
NK005(ca)016:423: dbo ni ljang khu rin chen khri //
NK005(ca)016:424: me bzhi dkar po glang po zhon //
NK005(ca)016:425: nag pa ljang gu rma bya'i khri //
NK005(ca)016:426: sa ri ser po spyang mo zhon //
NK005(ca)016:427: sa ga nag po ra dkar khri //
NK005(ca)016:429: lha mtshams ljang gu bya rog zhon //
NK005(ca)016:430: s+n+ron ni ser po 'bol stan khri //
NK005(ca)016:431: s+n+rub ni ser po rus sbal zhon //
NK005(ca)016:432: chu stod nag po zab 'bol gdan //
NK005(ca)016:433: chu smad dkar po tsit+ta zhon //
NK005(ca)016:434: byi bzhin ljang gu 'bol gyi gdan //
NK005(ca)016:435: gro bzhin ser mo khri la bzhugs //
NK005(ca)016:437: mos gre nag po glang dkar khri //
NK005(ca)016:438: mon gru ser po dar stan te //
NK005(ca)016:439: khrums stod ljang gu gser gyi gdan //
NK005(ca)016:440: khrums smad ser po khri'u'i gdan //
NK005(ca)016:441: nam gru dkar ser rta la zhon //
NK005(ca)016:442: tha skar dkar po mi la zhon //
NK005(ca)016:443: bra nye ljang gu 'khor lo zhon pa thams cad kyang lha mo'i gzugs can /
NK005(ca)016:444: lha'i gos kyi stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs can dar dang rin po ches brgyan pa /
NK005(ca)016:445: phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o //
NK005(ca)016:447: nak+sha tra h'u tsit+ta +aa be sha ya h+r+aimh gtod
NK005(ca)016:448: la non cig sarba an+tara b+h+yo sarba +aa yuhpun+d+ye sid+d+ham
NK005(ca)016:449: pha la h'u mi mthun sol cig mthun rkyen sgrubs
NK005(ca)016:450: shig ces bri / rtsi bcud lha mo bcu drug ni /
NK005(ca)016:451: shar du lha mo l+aa s+ya dkar mo /
NK005(ca)016:452: shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang dkar ser /
NK005(ca)016:453: rdo rje lha mo shel mdog dkar po /
NK005(ca)016:454: rin chen gser gyi lha mo ser po /
NK005(ca)016:455: lhor lha mo m+aa le ma sngon mo /
NK005(ca)016:456: lha mo nor rgyun ma sngo bsangs /
NK005(ca)016:457: lha mo khro gnyer ma sngon mo /
NK005(ca)016:458: rin chen g.yu'i lha mo sngon mo /
NK005(ca)016:459: nub tu lha mo g+airti ma dmar mo /
NK005(ca)016:460: rtsi'i lha mo grub pa mo dmar ser /
NK005(ca)016:461: lha mo sra brtan dbang bsgyur ma dmar mo //
NK005(ca)016:462: rin chen byi ru'i lha mo dmar mo /
NK005(ca)016:463: byang du lha mo nirti ma ljang mo /
NK005(ca)016:464: nags kyi lha mo rma bya'i mgrin ljang ser /
NK005(ca)016:465: lha mo gnyan gsal ma smug nag /
NK005(ca)016:466: rin chen in+d+ra'i lha mo ljang mo thams cad kyi phyag g.yas mda' dar dang /
NK005(ca)016:467: g.yon rnams me long thogs pa /
NK005(ca)016:468: dar dang rin po che'i rgyan ldan bzhengs stabs can no //
NK005(ca)016:470: ma h+aa de bi h+aum a mi ta sid+d+hi h'u /
NK005(ca)016:473: shar du dga' bo ser po sbrul mgo bcu'i gdengs ka /
NK005(ca)016:474: 'jog po dkar po sbrul mgo bcu'i gdengs ka /
NK005(ca)016:475: lhor sog ma med ser po sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka /
NK005(ca)016:476: dung skyong dkar po sbrul mgo brgya'i gdengs ka /
NK005(ca)016:477: nub tu gtsug na rin chen ser po sbrul mgo bzhi bcu'i gdengs ka /
NK005(ca)016:478: gzi chen dmar po sbrul mgo nyi shu'i gdengs ka /
NK005(ca)016:479: byang du mkhar nag nag po sbrul mgo nyis brgya'i
NK005(ca)016:480: gdengs ka sku stod khro bo'i cha byad kha nas
NK005(ca)016:481: me zhags 'phro ba glang po'i steng na bzhugs pa
NK005(ca)016:482: / sbal mdzes nag po sbrul mgo lnga bcu'i gdengs ka can /
NK005(ca)016:483: mkhar nag ma gtogs bdun po zhal gcig zhi 'dzum
NK005(ca)016:484: sku stod lha bu'i cha byad dar dang rin po
NK005(ca)016:485: ches brgyan pa sku smad sbrul du 'khyil ba /
NK005(ca)016:486: kun kyang g.yas thams cad pad+ma dang /
NK005(ca)016:487: g.yon rnams su dung chos bsnams shing rgya mtsho la gnas pa bri /
NK005(ca)016:489: phu n+aa ga h+aum d+ha la sam+b+ho sid+d+hi h'u lak+sh+m+ai sid+d+hi b+h+r+aum /
NK005(ca)016:490: phu sid+d+hi pha la hi da hi da s+w+aa /
NK005(ca)016:492: lha sku re re'i mdun nam mi 'grub na kun
NK005(ca)016:493: gyi mdun dbus phyogs su shing byang dkar po'i ngos
NK005(ca)016:494: su / a de ba tsit+ta sid+d+hi h'u de ba
NK005(ca)016:495: a mri ta ma h+ai ra na a tha h'u
NK005(ca)016:496: pra be sha ya hringah sid+d+hi pha la h+aum b+h+r+aum
NK005(ca)016:497: +aa yu she dzahpun+ye ba la te dzo b+h+r+aum n+aa
NK005(ca)016:498: n+aa kha d+he sid+d+hi h'u 'dus 'dus s+w+aa h+aa /
NK005(ca)016:499: zhes bris la btags pa shin tu gsang ba'i zab gnad du gsungs /
NK005(ca)016:500: rdo rje slob dpon gyi khri'i 'og tu /
NK005(ca)016:501: ru sbal gyi khog par stag skya 'brug sngon bya dmar rus sbal rgya bo bzhi'am /
NK005(ca)016:502: bya'i mal du sprel ser bshad pa'ang snang zhing /
NK005(ca)016:504: rlung lha ljang gu ba dan thogs shing sha ba
NK005(ca)016:505: yu mo la zhon pa rnams bris te dar sna
NK005(ca)016:506: 'bru sna dang bcas dar dkar khud du dril /
NK005(ca)016:507: tshon skud sna lngas rgya gram ris su bsdams la /
NK005(ca)016:508: d+ha la ma d+hu si pad+me h'u /
NK005(ca)016:509: yam b+ha ya b+he de ba h'u /
NK005(ca)016:510: sarba an+ta ra sh+aan+tim ku ru ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK005(ca)016:511: zhes pas basngagasa te bzhag pas 'byung ba'i gnod pa zhi /
NK005(ca)016:513: bkra shis bde legs 'byung bar gsungs /
NK005(ca)016:514: 'ga' zhig nas bcas 'di dkyil 'khor gyi 'og tu bzhag pa'ang bshad pas ci bder chog /
NK005(ca)016:515: 'di ni sgrub chen spyi la'ang gces so //
NK005(ca)016:516: sbol ba'i skabs sogs sman snod zangs dkar lta bu g.ya' med che legs gtsang ma dgos /
NK005(ca)016:517: ma 'byor na shing gzhong dang rdza snod gsar pas kyang rung /
NK005(ca)016:518: lcags snod lcags khem lcags thur sogs dang thug na
NK005(ca)016:519: mdog nag po bcos med du 'gyur bas shin tu
NK005(ca)016:520: spang dgos / de mtshungs sin+d+hu ra dang sa gi
NK005(ca)016:521: wam la'ang tshur 'dres stabs mang na nag por bsgyur
NK005(ca)016:522: bas phun tshogs tsam las 'debs mi btub /
NK005(ca)016:524: chang yang gsar ma rnams kyis bde mchog sdom 'byung
NK005(ca)016:525: las gsungs pa'i cho gas bsgrub pa lta bu ma
NK005(ca)016:526: byung na phal pas bdud rtsi ril bu sbyor ba
NK005(ca)016:527: sogs mi rung bar gsungs kyang /
NK005(ca)016:528: 'dir snang srid bdud rtsi rnam dag gi dgongs pa
NK005(ca)016:529: la dam rdzas gtso bo sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga
NK005(ca)016:530: rigs lnga'i bzhu btul gyis sbyong ba'i mos pa yin
NK005(ca)016:531: bzhin de tsam gyi gtsang dme'i rtog 'dzin mi dgos
NK005(ca)016:532: kyang / chang sna bzhi po la rab tu 'dzom
NK005(ca)016:533: na yang gter rdo rje bdud rtsi'i lugs kyi ma
NK005(ca)016:534: da na sgrub thems dang ma rnyed na sngar bsgrubs
NK005(ca)016:535: pa'i chos sman btab la bdud rtsi ltar byin rlabs
NK005(ca)016:537: dri bzang mdog bsgyur dam rtsi'i dbang lag phye rnams zur du dbye /
NK005(ca)016:538: sman phye gzhan thams cad skam po'i skabs su 'dres nges par 'phur /
NK005(ca)016:540: sbol ba'i tshad gzhung gsal ltar skam gsher ran pa dgos ha cang rlon ches na gong bur 'dril /
NK005(ca)016:541: skam ches na phye mar brdal /
NK005(ca)016:542: 'phur dus kyang shed ha cang ches na gong bur
NK005(ca)016:543: 'dril bas mi legs shing shugs chung se ba yun
NK005(ca)016:544: ring du 'phur thub na kha dog khug cing snub
NK005(ca)016:546: dbyar dus lta bur rul dogs kyi zon skyor dgos tshe sbol dus rlon chen po mi bya /
NK005(ca)016:547: grol dus bdud rtsi'i kha phru btab cing sbol bas legs pa 'byung /
NK005(ca)016:548: spyir nam zla dpyid sos dang /
NK005(ca)016:549: ston ka bsil drod snyoms pas bya stabs bde /
NK005(ca)016:550: khyad par ston zla tha chung dang /
NK005(ca)016:551: dpyid zla 'bring po'i yar ngo la mchog tu basngagasa /
NK005(ca)016:554: dpyid ka'i thog mar skam nyen yod pas nam dus
NK005(ca)016:555: dang bstun pa'i tsha tshod dang grang tshod skam rlon
NK005(ca)016:556: gyi gnad zhib cha bya dgos /
NK005(ca)016:557: sbol ba'i thog mar chu sogs blugs zin rjes dam
NK005(ca)016:558: rdzas phab gta' sngar nas chu gtsang la btab nas
NK005(ca)016:559: bzhag pa la slar chang gi nying khu mang tsam
NK005(ca)016:561: thams cad zhu nas sman la bsre /
NK005(ca)016:562: sbol zin rjes dri bzang rigs dang mdog sgyur rnams bsre /
NK005(ca)016:563: de'ang kha che dri bzang phye ma skam 'debs gang 'byor dang /
NK005(ca)016:564: khrol bu g.ya' med pa'i snod du zhag gcig sogs
NK005(ca)016:565: sbangs nas cung zad bskol ba dang tshags la btsags
NK005(ca)016:566: pa'i dwangs ma bran pa las /
NK005(ca)016:567: phye ma byas nas sbangs na dwangs snyigs 'dres nas dngos gtsang rang mi 'ong /
NK005(ca)016:568: mdangs 'don dus k+shi la w+aa ri ste ja bzang po'i gar khus kyang 'tshams par bran /
NK005(ca)016:570: snum shas chung na mar dkar btsag bcad pa'i khu
NK005(ca)016:571: ba nyung tsam re lag par byugs nas 'phur bas
NK005(ca)016:572: smug pa dang snum zhag can du 'gyur /
NK005(ca)016:573: dpyid dus lcang dkar kha 'bus kyi thang chu bsre
NK005(ca)016:574: rgyu byung na snum dang dam rtsi gnyis ka 'ong
NK005(ca)016:575: / de nas chang phab phye ma zho re la
NK005(ca)016:576: rdog po dang btang yul gsho dang bstun pa skam
NK005(ca)016:577: 'debs byed pa'ang snang rung chang bzang dron mo nang
NK005(ca)016:578: 'dres par dkrugs te blugs la khyab par 'phur ba
NK005(ca)016:579: / 'di legs / rdo rjes dkrugs zhes pa 'byor na bam gtsang ma'i gsang rdor dngos dang /
NK005(ca)016:580: ma 'byor na shing sogs las bcos pa'i gsang rdor
NK005(ca)016:581: gyis dkrugs te sngar smin gling du sman sgrub gnang
NK005(ca)016:582: skabs chos dbang rin po che'i dus su sman dkrugs
NK005(ca)016:583: pa'i rdo rje yin zhes grags pa'i shing gi gsang
NK005(ca)016:585: 'on kyang phyag mtshan gyi rdo rje la der btags pas kyang rung bar byed /
NK005(ca)016:586: phye sgrub kyi sman bsnyal tshul lag len mi 'dra
NK005(ca)016:587: ba 'ga' re 'dug kyang sman phye mang nyung gang
NK005(ca)016:588: yin kyang stabs bde ba'i phyag len ni /
NK005(ca)016:589: zangs dkar dri med dang bal po'i rag rdig nang
NK005(ca)016:590: rtsi ldan pa lta bu gtsang zhing g.ya' med pa'i
NK005(ca)016:591: snod ma 'byor na rdza gsar pas kyang rung ste
NK005(ca)016:592: che chung sman sgye shong tshod dang bstun pa'i nang
NK005(ca)016:593: bal bu'i phur ma dang 'bru sna rlan can 'tshams
NK005(ca)016:594: par blugs pa'i dkyil kyong mo byas pa la mo
NK005(ca)016:595: thod 'khor lo bris pa dpral ba mdun dang kha
NK005(ca)016:596: gyen bstan gyi steng sman sgye bzhag pa'i steeng pho
NK005(ca)016:597: thod 'khor lo can dpral ba mdun bstan kha sbubs
NK005(ca)016:598: pas bkab / snod kyi kha dar sna lnga'am rten khebs lta bus g.yogs /
NK005(ca)016:599: tshon skud sna lngas rgya gram du rgyas btab /
NK005(ca)016:600: snod kyi khar dbu rgyan rigs lnga sgron /
NK005(ca)016:601: g.yas g.yon du rdor dril bcing /
NK005(ca)016:602: steng du bam gtsang ma'i rdo rje sbubs can dngos sam bcos pa'am der btags pa'i gzungs rdor dang /
NK005(ca)016:603: che mchog bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ljang ser khro 'dzum
NK005(ca)016:604: phyag gnyis thal sbyar bar bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams
NK005(ca)016:606: zhabs phyed skyil pad nyi la bzhugs pa'i skur gsal ba nyid rad gling nas gal po cher gsungs /
NK005(ca)016:607: sman snod lcags sgyed lta bur bzhugs pa'i 'og tu
NK005(ca)016:608: mi tshil dang dug gsum gyi tshil bu bsres pa'i
NK005(ca)016:609: drod 'bebs mar me sdong shed nam dus bstun pa
NK005(ca)016:610: sbar ba'i phyi rol dar khang dkar dmar mthing gsum
NK005(ca)016:611: gyi yol ba bres la me ngad rlung gis mi
NK005(ca)016:612: 'phrog par bya / phyogs re rer tsha ches grang
NK005(ca)016:613: ches ma yin par sman gyi khang bu spyi snyoms
NK005(ca)016:614: su tsha chi le ba dang /
NK005(ca)016:615: sman snod la drod rgyun ldan du yod pa dgos /
NK005(ca)016:616: sgrub bzhag ma tshang gong sman langs pa'i rtags byung na mar me bcad /
NK005(ca)016:617: kha phye ba sogs byed mkhan 'dug kyang gzhung dang
NK005(ca)016:618: 'gal bas mi bya zhing de 'dra dgos pa'ang mi
NK005(ca)016:619: 'byung ngo // sgrub pa po'i grangs spros bcas kyi dbang du byas te rdo rje rgyal po /
NK005(ca)016:620: phyogs bzhi'i rigs kyi gtso bo bzhi /
NK005(ca)016:625: rgya thebs bzhi sogs dgu po der yab yum tshang dgos pas bco brgyad /
NK005(ca)016:627: dus mtshams pa'am drod 'dzin pa gcig /
NK005(ca)016:630: rdul phyags pa gcig rnams la yum dmigs bsal ma gsungs pas med kyang chog la /
NK005(ca)016:631: byan par pho mo gnyis dgos la /
NK005(ca)016:632: de dag gi so so'i las byed tshul ni sgrub khog tu gsal ba ltar yin la /
NK005(ca)016:633: der ma gtogs pa'i mched lcam rab pho brgyad dang /
NK005(ca)016:636: tha ma gnyis sam gsum ste /
NK005(ca)016:637: khyo na yongs su dril bas rgyas pa rang gi dbang du byas na /
NK005(ca)016:638: bzhi bcu zhe bzhi tsam cis kyang dgos la /
NK005(ca)016:639: 'dir rdo rje slob dpon dang rdo rje rgyal po gnyis gcig tu bgyis mod /
NK005(ca)016:640: gzhan du so sor gsungs pa'ang yod la /
NK005(ca)016:641: dgongs 'dus su rdo rje rgyal po dang /
NK005(ca)016:642: rgyal tshab bcas gtso che ba gnyis su byed cing grangs lhag po gzhan yang gsungs /
NK005(ca)016:644: yab yum gtso 'khor gyi rnam par bsgom rgyu yod pa rnams la /
NK005(ca)016:645: slob dpon yab kyis yab dang /
NK005(ca)016:646: yum gyis yum rang gi nga rgyal dang rnam pa gsal 'debs shing /
NK005(ca)016:647: des mtshon nas gzhan dag kyang sde tshan bcad de
NK005(ca)016:648: lha grangs dang mtshungs pa'i yab yum gyi nga rgyal
NK005(ca)016:650: ji skad bshad pa'i sgrub pa po pho mo dngos
NK005(ca)016:651: su ma 'dzoms kyang der btags pas rung ba nyid
NK005(ca)016:652: do // phye sgrub dngos gzhi'i skabs dkyil 'khor bdun
NK005(ca)016:653: dang sbyor ba brgyad kyi rnam bzhag gsungs pa'i dang
NK005(ca)016:654: po bdag rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ni /
NK005(ca)016:655: bdag nyid rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gang rung du gsal btab pa las dzapa khang phyes te /
NK005(ca)016:656: mdun gyi rten dang dbyer med par me ri 'dab 'byar gyi tshul du 'khod par mos pa'o //
NK005(ca)016:657: gnyis pa bdud rtsi rang byung gi dkyil 'khor ni /
NK005(ca)016:658: bsgom gzhi sman gyi snod bdud rtsi dang bcas pa /
NK005(ca)016:659: bsgom bya snying po'i dkyil 'khor nyid bdud rtsir zhu
NK005(ca)016:660: ba dpa' bo 'bru lngas mtshan par gsal gdab pa'o
NK005(ca)016:661: // gsum pa 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ram /
NK005(ca)016:662: phyogs bcu khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ni /
NK005(ca)016:663: bdag nyid gtso bo yab yum gyi sbyor mtshams nas khro bcu bsam gyis mi khyab par spros te /
NK005(ca)016:665: mdun gyi bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor gyi kha khyer gyi phyogs mtshams su 'khod par bsam zhing /
NK005(ca)016:666: stobs po che ni thod pa'i 'og gi me'i dkyil 'khor /
NK005(ca)016:667: h'u mdzad ni rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor gyi
NK005(ca)016:668: 'og bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng phyogs kyi nam
NK005(ca)016:669: mkhar bsgom mo // bzhi pa rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni /
NK005(ca)016:671: rang byung bdud rtsi rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor steng //
NK005(ca)016:672: zhes sogs kyis bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rta mgrin yum bzhi dang bcas pa bskyed cing /
NK005(ca)016:673: sbyor ba dus gcig tu mdzad pa ni lha mo
NK005(ca)016:674: so so'i snang ngor gtso bo'i zhal so so la
NK005(ca)016:675: phyogs par bzhugs nas rol pa'i gnad kyis yin no
NK005(ca)016:676: // lnga pa sku gdung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor ni /
NK005(ca)016:678: phyogs mtshams mthar byed brgyad steng phyogs bzhi ru //
NK005(ca)016:679: zhes sogs kyis bud+d+ha khrag 'thung gi zhabs gnyis kyis khro bcu'i shar dang /
NK005(ca)016:680: shar lho'i khro bo'i dbu mnan zhing /
NK005(ca)016:686: byang shar gyi khro bo'i dbu mnan pa'i dbus kyi
NK005(ca)016:687: nam mkha' ches mtho bar badz+ra he ru ka zhal
NK005(ca)016:688: gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi pa'i /
NK005(ca)016:689: zhabs mdun ma gnyis shar nub kyi khro bo gnyis dang /
NK005(ca)016:690: rgyab ma gnyis kyis lho byang gi khro bo gnyis kyi dbu mnan pa'am /
NK005(ca)016:691: yang na mdun mas shar dang lho /
NK005(ca)016:692: rgyab mas nub dang byang mnan par bya'o //
NK005(ca)016:693: mngon rtogs rgyas pa bsgom mi nus na /
NK005(ca)016:694: khrag 'thung lnga ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis par byas kyang chog gsungs /
NK005(ca)016:695: drug pa mkha' mnyam klong gi dkyil 'khor ni /
NK005(ca)016:696: rdo rje khrag 'thung dbu'i steng gnam zhal yum //
NK005(ca)016:697: zhes sogs kyis yum gnam zhal ma dbu dgu phyag
NK005(ca)016:698: bco brgyad zhabs brgyad dang ldan pa'i zhabs g.yas pa
NK005(ca)016:699: bzhis badz+ra he ru ka'i dbu g.yas pa dang /
NK005(ca)016:700: g.yon pa bzhis dbu g.yon pa mnan zhing /
NK005(ca)016:701: dbu dbus ma'i spyan gsum gyi dkyil ma'i phyed yan
NK005(ca)016:702: gnam zhal ma'i b+ha ga'i nang du chud pa bsgom
NK005(ca)016:703: / bdun pa 'chi med rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni /
NK005(ca)016:704: gnam zhal yum steng che mchog he ru ka /
NK005(ca)016:705: zhes sogs kyis gnam zhal ma'i steng du che mchog smug nag dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig /
NK005(ca)016:706: phyag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa /
NK005(ca)016:707: zhabs brgyad kyis yum gyi dbu brgyad bardzisa shing /
NK005(ca)016:708: gsang gnas kyi rdo rje yum gyi rtsa zhal gyi
NK005(ca)016:709: smin mtshams kyi dbu ma'i mkha' klong du bcug par
NK005(ca)016:710: bsgoms te / dkyil 'khor bdun brtsegs su byed tshul yin la /
NK005(ca)016:711: che mchog gi ljags kyi steng du sa nu he
NK005(ca)016:712: ru ka yab yum bsgoms pa la ye shes sems
NK005(ca)016:713: dpa'i dkyil 'khor zhes zur du phye nas dkyil 'khor
NK005(ca)016:716: bzhi par ta krita khro bo'i dkyil 'khor dang /
NK005(ca)016:717: lnga par mkha' dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK005(ca)016:718: drug par rdo rje tshe'i dkyil 'khor dang /
NK005(ca)016:719: che mchog gi dbu'i nang du rigs lnga yab yum dang /
NK005(ca)016:720: dbu gtsug tu rta zhal yod par bdun pa rta
NK005(ca)016:721: mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor zhes bzhed pa yang yod
NK005(ca)016:722: la / lung 'di la che mchog gi rdo rje
NK005(ca)016:723: gnam zhal ma'i rtsa zhal gyi nang du chud par
NK005(ca)016:724: la / bsgom mo // che mchog yab yum gyi
NK005(ca)016:725: sbyor mtshams nas khro bcu spros par sku stong gsum
NK005(ca)016:728: thugs badz+ra he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor /
NK005(ca)016:729: yon tan 'chi med rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor /
NK005(ca)016:730: phrin las gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor /
NK005(ca)016:731: gzi brjid mkha' mnyam klong gi dkyil 'khor /
NK005(ca)016:732: ye shes sems dpa' rang byung bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor zhes 'dren tshul gcig dang /
NK005(ca)016:733: 'di dag gi skabs su sbyor brgyad kyi dmigs pa byed na /
NK005(ca)016:734: che mchog gtso bo'i ljags kyi steng gi sa nu
NK005(ca)016:735: he ru ka yab yum sbyor ba ni ye shes
NK005(ca)016:736: kyi sbyor ba / phyag zhe gnyis kyi g.yas pa'i zhi ba yab rnams dang /
NK005(ca)016:737: g.yon pa'i yum rnams sbyor zhing phyag mtshan thams cad
NK005(ca)016:738: kyang lhar sbyor ba ni phyag mtshan gyi sbyor ba
NK005(ca)016:739: / yab kyi rdo rje yum gyi smin mtshams kyi mkhar sbyor ba ni zhal gyi sbyor ba /
NK005(ca)016:740: yum gyi b+ha gar badz+ra he ru ka'i dbu sbyor ba ni dbu'i sbyor ba /
NK005(ca)016:741: gtso bo'i zhabs kyis yum gyi dbur sbyor ba ni zhabs kyi sbyor ba /
NK005(ca)016:742: rta mgrin gyis yum bzhir sbyor ba ni dbang gi sbyor ba /
NK005(ca)016:743: dam tshig sman gyi bdud rtsi la ye shes kyi bdud rtsi sbyor ba ni rdzas kyi sbyor ba /
NK005(ca)016:744: rdzas dkyil gyi pho mo'i thod pa sbyor ba ni
NK005(ca)016:745: thabs shes kyi sbyor ba zhes bya ste brgyad do
NK005(ca)016:746: // yang na ye shes kyi sbyor ba lnga dang /
NK005(ca)016:747: 'jig rten cha mthun gyi sbyor ba gsum ste brgyad du 'byed pa yang yod do //
NK005(ca)016:748: bzhi pa dzapa dgongs kyi skabs /
NK005(ca)016:749: bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gsal ba'i thugs
NK005(ca)016:750: kar nyi ma la gnas pa'i rdo rje dkar po
NK005(ca)016:751: rtse lnga pa gyen 'greng gi lte bar a yig
NK005(ca)016:752: +aahmh'u sarba pany+tsa a mri ta h'u h+r+aihth+aah zhes pa'i
NK005(ca)016:753: sngags phreng gis bskor ba las 'od zer 'ja' tshon
NK005(ca)016:755: bdud rtsi'i 'og gi rlung dkyil la phog pas rlung
NK005(ca)016:756: g.yos me sbar bdud rtsi khol ba'i zer rlangs las
NK005(ca)016:757: dpa' bo 'bru lnga 'od zer 'phro ba bsam gyis
NK005(ca)016:759: de las mchod pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung ste /
NK005(ca)016:761: de las 'od zer 'phros pas dbang gi dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhin du sku gdung /
NK005(ca)016:763: 'chi med rdo rje'i bar mchod pas /
NK005(ca)016:764: dgyes shing tshim par bsam pa ni mchod pa mas 'bul zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
NK005(ca)016:765: de ltar mchod pa'i rkyen gyis 'chi med rdo rje'i
NK005(ca)016:766: dkyil 'khor las bdud rtsi 'od zer kha dog lnga
NK005(ca)016:767: ldan byang sems kyi rang bzhin can bsam gyis mi
NK005(ca)016:768: khyab pa sku'i cha shas spyi dang /
NK005(ca)016:769: khyad par rdo rje'i lam nas byung ste gnam zhal ma'i smin mtshams kyi mkha' klong du zhugs /
NK005(ca)016:770: de'i sku'i dbyibs brgyud badz+ra he ru ka'i dbu gtsug
NK005(ca)016:771: nas zhugs pas sngar las kyang ches cher mang ba
NK005(ca)016:772: babs te / zhabs kyi dbyibs brgyud nas phyogs kyi khro bo bzhi'i dbu gtsug dang /
NK005(ca)016:773: sbyor mtshams nas babs pas bdud rtsi rta mgrin dbang dkyil gyi lha tshogs kyi dbu gtsug nas zhugs /
NK005(ca)016:774: phyogs kyi khro bo bzhi'i zhabs g.yas g.yon las babs
NK005(ca)016:775: pa'i bdud rtsi phyogs mtshams kyi ta kri ta brgyad
NK005(ca)016:776: kyi dbu gtsug nas zhugs te /
NK005(ca)016:777: de dag yongs rdzogs las babs pa'i bdud rtsi thod
NK005(ca)016:778: pa'i nang gi bdud rtsi dang ro gcig tu 'dres
NK005(ca)016:779: par bsam pa ni dbang yas bskur zhes bya ba
NK005(ca)016:780: yin no // slar yang sngar bshad pa'i sbyor ba
NK005(ca)016:781: brgyad kyi sbyor mtshams nas 'od zer bsam gyis mi
NK005(ca)016:783: mkha' khyab kyi rgyal ba sras bcas thams cad mchod de byin rlabs rnams tshur bsdus /
NK005(ca)016:784: sems can thams cad kyi sdig sgrib sbyangs /
NK005(ca)016:785: snang srid thams cad bdud rtsi sman gyi dkyil 'khor
NK005(ca)016:786: du bsgyur ba'i dwangs bcud bdud rtsi 'od zer dang
NK005(ca)016:787: bcas pa'i rnam par bsdus nas rang la thim pas
NK005(ca)016:788: lag pa g.yon pa'i dbyibs brgyud mtheb srin rta mgrin
NK005(ca)016:789: yab yum du gsal ba'i sbyor mtshams nas thon pa
NK005(ca)016:790: dang lhan cig par rta mgrin yab yum kyang 'o
NK005(ca)016:793: bsrub pa la sogs pa bde ba chen po'i nyams
NK005(ca)016:794: 'gyur dpag tu med pa mdzad de lhag par myos
NK005(ca)016:795: pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur pa'i sbyor mtshams nas
NK005(ca)016:796: byang sems dkar dmar gyi rgyun brag steng nas chu
NK005(ca)016:797: 'bab pa bzhin du byung ba sngar gyi bdud rtsi
NK005(ca)016:798: dang lhan cig par gzungs thag 'od kyi sbu gu'i
NK005(ca)016:799: rnam par can gyi khong gseng brgyud de bdud rtsi
NK005(ca)016:800: rang byung gi dkyil 'khor la thim pas dam rdzas
NK005(ca)016:801: thod pa kha sbyor gyi bar na mchis pa de
NK005(ca)016:802: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi mu tig lta bu shin
NK005(ca)016:803: tu dkar ba'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsam /
NK005(ca)016:804: de yang thod pa kha sbyar gyi snang ba shar dus de ltar bya ba yin gyi /
NK005(ca)016:805: gzhan du na dkyil 'khor drug gi rmang gzhi bdud
NK005(ca)016:806: rtsi dkyil 'khor thod pa'i rnam par shar ba'i nang
NK005(ca)016:807: gi dam rdzas la bstim rgyu yin no //
NK005(ca)016:808: mchod pa mas 'bul gyi spros bsdu'i skabs su 'chi
NK005(ca)016:809: med rdo rje'i lha tshogs rnams mchod pa'i mthar 'od
NK005(ca)016:811: steng gi nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i sman bla drang srong /
NK005(ca)016:812: rig 'dzin bka' srung dang bcas pa rnams la mchod
NK005(ca)016:813: pas de dag thams cad shin tu dgyes nas dzapa
NK005(ca)016:814: dbyangs dang / glu gar gyi rnam 'gyur cir yang mdzad cing bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs /
NK005(ca)016:815: gnas dang yo byad thams cad byin gyis rlob par bsam zhing /
NK005(ca)016:816: de dag las bdud rtsi babs pa 'chi med rdo
NK005(ca)016:817: rje'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs nas dbang yas bskur gyi
NK005(ca)016:818: dmigs skor la 'jug pa gces so //
NK005(ca)016:820: +aahmh'u sarba pany+tsa a mri ta h'u h+r+aihth+aah zhes dgu pa'i sngags su grags pa nyid yin la /
NK005(ca)016:821: +aahmh'u ni sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i sa bon te
NK005(ca)016:822: lus ngag yid gsum gyi dri ma sbyangs te sku
NK005(ca)016:823: gsung thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi bdud rtsir bsgyur
NK005(ca)016:825: sarba pany+tsa a mri ta ni thams cad bdud rtsi lnga zhes pa ste /
NK005(ca)016:826: rdo rje gsum gyi sa bon des bsgrub bya'i dam
NK005(ca)016:827: rdzas thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin du byin
NK005(ca)016:831: th+aa ni dbyer med du byed pa'i don te /
NK005(ca)016:832: ji ltar byin gyis brlab tshul bstan nas nus ldan du byed pa'i don yin no //
NK005(ca)016:833: sarba pany+tsa bor nas badz+ra zhes bzla ba yang bshad do //
NK005(ca)016:835: skyabs sems nas bzung ste sman dzapa bzla ba'i bar btang nas /
NK005(ca)016:836: sngags rgyun 'dzin mkhan sogs tshang ma chab cig par /
NK005(ca)016:838: b+hany+dza'i gzhal yas khang na bdud rtsi yi //
NK005(ca)016:839: zhes sogs dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i sgo nas /
NK005(ca)016:840: +aahmh'u sarba pany+tsa a mri ta kun+da l+ai h'u h+r+aihth+aah
NK005(ca)016:841: zhes dmigs pa dang bcas te rtse gcig tu bazla'o
NK005(ca)016:842: // de ltar yang myang gter bka' brgyad kyi bdud rtsi'i man ngag las /
NK005(ca)016:843: las ye shes 'od byung zhing +aahyi mes bsregs thal
NK005(ca)016:844: bar sbyang h'u gis bdud rtsir rnam par dag sarba
NK005(ca)016:845: thams cad bdud rtsir gsal pany+tsa rnam lnga mngon sangs
NK005(ca)016:846: rgyas a ni skye med chos kyi sku mri ni
NK005(ca)016:847: dug gsum rtsad nas gcod ta ni thugs rje'i 'od
NK005(ca)016:848: zer spro kun+da l+ai ni bdud rtsir 'khyil h'u ni
NK005(ca)016:849: ye shes lnga yi dngos h+r+aihni bdud rtsi'i dngos grub
NK005(ca)016:850: sdud th+aa ni thams cad sangs rgyas pa'o zhes gsungs
NK005(ca)016:851: / de nas phrin las bskul ba ni //
NK005(ca)016:852: bdud rtsi 'thor ba dang sbrags te //
NK005(ca)016:853: bdag cag skal ldan sgrub pa pos zhes sogs brjod //
NK005(ca)016:855: dkyil 'khor lha tshogs mkha' nas byang chub sems /
NK005(ca)016:856: zhes sogs kyis sbyor mtshams nas 'dzag la khad du
NK005(ca)016:857: bskyil ba'i bdud rtsi de dag har sgra dang bcas
NK005(ca)016:858: babs shing / sman srung gi rig 'dzin rnams kyis
NK005(ca)016:859: kyang 'a khor 'das kyi bcud thams cad bdud rtsi'i
NK005(ca)016:860: rnam par bsdus nas mtsho la char 'bebs pa bzhin
NK005(ca)016:861: du dam rdzas la bstims pas kha dog dri ro
NK005(ca)016:862: nus pa phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin du gyur
NK005(ca)016:863: babs shing / par bsam la / +aahmh'u sogs dbab pa'i bzlas pa stong du longs pa bzla zhing /
NK005(ca)016:864: slob dpon gyi sor mo bsnol ba las mdzub mo sgreng /
NK005(ca)016:865: mthe bong bkug pa dbab pa'i phyag rgyas sman gyi steng nas dgab /
NK005(ca)016:866: bshug glu rkang gling dang bcas pa'i sgo nas /
NK005(ca)016:868: 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba //
NK005(ca)016:869: zhes sogs kyis ma mo brgyad bskul la ru lu nyer gcig bzlas nas /
NK005(ca)016:870: sman gyi pho brang nang du rta mchog dpal //
NK005(ca)016:871: zhes sogs kyi bzlas pa brgya phrag tsam dang bcas /
NK005(ca)016:872: rta mgrin dbang dkyil gyi yab yum mnyam par sbyor
NK005(ca)016:873: ba'i mtshams nas byang sems dkar dmar gyi bdud rtsi'i
NK005(ca)016:874: rgyun bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'bab /
NK005(ca)016:875: bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor dang dbyer med du 'dres /
NK005(ca)016:876: de las bdud rtsi'i rgyun smyug sbubs las chu drangs
NK005(ca)016:877: pa bzhin du gzungs thag 'od kyi sbu gu'i khong
NK005(ca)016:878: gseng brgyud de 'ongs pa mtheb srin rta mgrin yab
NK005(ca)016:879: yum du gsal ba'i sbyor mtshams brgyad lus kyi nang
NK005(ca)016:881: snying po'i dwangs ma snying ga'i mi shigs pa'i thig le dang ro gcig tu gyur par bsam /
NK005(ca)016:884: nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
NK005(ca)016:885: zhes sogs kyis dkyil 'khor drug brtsegs kyi lha tshogs
NK005(ca)016:886: rnams la nged kyis de ltar tshul bzhin du bsgrubs
NK005(ca)016:887: shing dbang du byas kyang rtags dang mtshan ma bzang
NK005(ca)016:888: po la sogs pa bstan nas dngos grub kyi 'bras
NK005(ca)016:889: bu myur du 'byin par ma mdzad na /
NK005(ca)016:890: khyed rnams kyis sngon thugs bskyed dam bcas zhal gyis
NK005(ca)016:891: bzhes pa'i dam tshig thams cad las nyams par 'gyur
NK005(ca)016:892: ro // zhes tha tshig bsgrags pas lha tshogs thams cad thugs dam gyi gsos thebs te /
NK005(ca)016:893: khro bo khro mo rnams kyis bgegs bskrad /
NK005(ca)016:894: dpa' bos shis pa brjod cing bro brdung /
NK005(ca)016:895: dpa' mo rnams kyis rdo rje'i glu len /
NK005(ca)016:896: mchod pa'i bye brag sna tshogs pa thogs te me tog gi char 'bebs /
NK005(ca)016:897: dngos grub stsol ba la rings par chas te stsol ma rag lta bur bsam //
NK005(ca)016:898: de nas dngos grub blang ba'i skabs /
NK005(ca)016:899: sgrub khog nas bshad pa ltar gyi dngos grub kyi rdzas rnams tshogs par byas la /
NK005(ca)016:900: rang nyid sngar sman dkyil dang zhal sprod kyi dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i rnam par mchis pa de /
NK005(ca)016:901: rta mgrin gyi rnam par bsgyur nas dkyil 'khor gyi
NK005(ca)016:902: shar phyogs su 'khod pa dngos grub len pa por
NK005(ca)016:903: bgyis te dkyus nas 'byung ba ltar dngos grub blang
NK005(ca)016:904: / de'i tshe dkyil 'khor bdun brtsegs kyi 'khor lo
NK005(ca)016:905: thams cad nas sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs rnams
NK005(ca)016:906: bdud rtsi 'od zer kha dog lnga ldan gyi rnam
NK005(ca)016:907: / par byung ste / rang gi gnas gsum du
NK005(ca)016:908: thim pas sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob par
NK005(ca)016:909: / par byung ste / bsam / snyim pa me tog dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor la btud de /
NK005(ca)016:914: yum gyis sman snod dkyil 'khor nas bton te gdan drangs pa slob dpon gyi dbu gtsug tu bzhag /
NK005(ca)016:915: slob dpon gyis rang nyid bdag rang bzhin gyi dkyil
NK005(ca)016:916: 'khor du gsal ba la bdud rtsi rtsa ba'i dkyil
NK005(ca)016:917: 'khor drug brtsegs yongs su rdzogs pa thim pas dbyer
NK005(ca)016:918: mi phyed par gyur par bsam la /
NK005(ca)016:919: bdud rtsi'i lha tshogs brjod cing slob dpon gyis dbang
NK005(ca)016:920: nod pa'i bar du tshogs pa byings nas sman dzapa
NK005(ca)016:921: bzla / slob ma la dbang bskur skabs /
NK005(ca)016:922: slob ma rnams kyis ru lu'i dzapa gar gyi bro
NK005(ca)016:923: dang bcas slob dpon dang sman gyi pho brang la
NK005(ca)016:927: zhes sogs kyis me tog gtor /
NK005(ca)016:929: dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du //
NK005(ca)016:930: zhes sogs kyis gsol ba btab pa la /
NK005(ca)016:931: slob dpon gyis bdud rtsi'i rnam bzhag sgrub pa'i khog
NK005(ca)016:932: dbub sogs khyad par gyi yon tan brjod pa sngon
NK005(ca)016:933: du 'gro ba'i sgo nas bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor de
NK005(ca)016:934: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo
NK005(ca)016:935: rje'i rang bzhin du rdzogs pa rnam pa thod par
NK005(ca)016:936: bskyil ba'i bdud rtsi dkar la dmar ba'i mdangs can
NK005(ca)016:938: dwangs ma'i bdud rtsi 'dzag pa spyi gtsug nas zhugs
NK005(ca)016:939: te lus kyi cha shas thams cad yongs su gang
NK005(ca)016:940: bas dbang bzhi rdzogs par thob par bsam /
NK005(ca)016:942: gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag chos kyi dbyings //
NK005(ca)016:943: zhes sogs sngags dang bcas pas dbang bskur te /
NK005(ca)016:944: de dang rjes 'brel du sgrub rdzas gzhan rnams kyi dbang yang ci rigs par bskur /
NK005(ca)016:946: sman stegs la bzhugs su gsol /
NK005(ca)016:947: de nas sngon rgyud gsungs pa'i gleng gzhi dang 'brel
NK005(ca)016:948: bar dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyis bdud rtsi 'jam dpal
NK005(ca)016:950: de'i thugs rgyud bskul bar bsam la many+dzu sh+r+ai'i sngags
NK005(ca)016:951: bzlas pas des bdag nyid la gnang ba byin par
NK005(ca)016:952: mos la blangs te rgya bkrol /
NK005(ca)016:953: kha phyes la dngos grub blang /
NK005(ca)016:954: skabs 'dir sman snod nas rin po che'i gzhong par
NK005(ca)016:955: blugs la phra brtags par gsungs pa ltar byed na
NK005(ca)016:956: / a ru ra'i dbyibs gong bu gcig tu 'dril na dngos grub gnyis ka 'grub /
NK005(ca)016:957: dum bu gsum du gyur na zas nor longs spyod 'phel /
NK005(ca)016:958: lngar gyur na tshe la dbang /
NK005(ca)016:959: mang du shigs kyis 'phel na slob ma la bzang /
NK005(ca)016:960: che ba gcig la chung ba mang pos bskor ba ltar byung na slob dpon la dge /
NK005(ca)016:961: snod du mi shong ba phyir lhud na yul khams la dge /
NK005(ca)016:962: snum la ma dog bzang zhing dri ngad che na
NK005(ca)016:963: legs shing de las ldog pa rnams ngan pa'i rtags
NK005(ca)016:964: su gsungs so // sgrub pa'i dus su nam langs skabs khang steng nas gser skyems btang /
NK005(ca)016:966: dus drug tu bsang btang zhing sman gyi lha dang
NK005(ca)016:967: drang srong dkar phyogs skyong ba rnams kyis dngos grub
NK005(ca)016:968: myur du skyol cig pa'i 'bod pa btang /
NK005(ca)016:969: dri za la gsur bsngo ba sogs gal che bar
NK005(ca)016:970: bshad cing chags med rin po ches mdzad pa'i dngos
NK005(ca)016:971: grub bskul ba'i bsang gsur zhes pa de zur bzhugs
NK005(ca)016:972: re zung gis btang na gter gzhung rnams kyi dgongs
NK005(ca)016:974: rgyun du chos sman bzhugs pa'i snod kyi snying por
NK005(ca)016:975: a ru ra gser mdog rma med pa rab nyer
NK005(ca)016:977: tha ma bdun ras dkar gyis dril la gzhug pa
NK005(ca)016:978: man ngag gi gnad du gsungs pa'ang de ltar bya'o
NK005(ca)016:979: // deng dus thams cad kyis phyag sner 'gyed rgyu'i
NK005(ca)016:980: rten 'dus la chos sman du btags pa bzang sman
NK005(ca)016:981: spus ldan bsdus te mos sgrub mtshon tsam re byed
NK005(ca)016:982: pa la ni bar chad dang dngos grub gnyis ka
NK005(ca)016:984: gzhung mthun gyi dam rdzas tshul bzhin bsags /
NK005(ca)016:985: sgrub pa tshad ldan rtse gcig byed na shin tu gzab pa gal che ste /
NK005(ca)016:987: mdor na 'di ni gzhan sgrub pa'i rigs rnams dang mi 'dra bas /
NK005(ca)016:988: dang po nas rkyen de rnams mi 'byung ba'i thabs dang bya ba la 'bad do //
NK005(ca)016:989: 'di ni khe che la nyen che ba'i sgrub pa
NK005(ca)016:990: yin pas shin tu gzab nas ba sgrub par bya'o
NK005(ca)016:994: dud 'gro'i ro gzugs kyi rnam par byung ba /
NK005(ca)016:996: dri ngad ma khug cing sngar yod yal ba /
NK005(ca)016:997: mdog dang ro mi sdug pa sogs mi 'grub pa dang bar chad kyi rtags kyang 'byung ba las /
NK005(ca)016:998: rul ba ni rgyu ma dag pa las 'byung bar gsungs pa dang /
NK005(ca)016:999: gzhan rnams dam sel dang mi ma yin pa'i bar
NK005(ca)016:1000: chad las kyang 'byung bas nyu le skrod cing srung
NK005(ca)016:1001: 'khor bsgom / mdos glud yang yang bsngo /
NK005(ca)016:1002: nad gdon gyi bar chad 'chi rkyen sogs byung na'ang
NK005(ca)016:1003: de dbang du ma shor bar sgrub pa mtha' skyol
NK005(ca)016:1004: bar bya / gtso bo rdo rje slob dpon sogs bskyed bzlas las su rung /
NK005(ca)016:1005: lha sgom ting 'dzin gyi gding dang ldan /
NK005(ca)016:1006: mched lcam rnams dam sel med cing sgrub pa la
NK005(ca)016:1007: blo mthun pa'i mos gus rtse gcig pas thang lhod
NK005(ca)016:1008: ma shor bar bsgrubs na dngos grub 'grub pa'i rtags
NK005(ca)016:1009: dang mtshan ma rang rang gi skal ba dang 'tshams
NK005(ca)016:1011: zhes snga 'gyur bstan pa'i snang byed chen po rig
NK005(ca)016:1012: 'dzin 'gyur med rdo rjes mdzad pa'i dam rdzas bdud
NK005(ca)016:1013: rtsi'i sgrub thabs kyi gsal byed zhabs tog gi tshul
NK005(ca)016:1014: du pad+ma gar dbang blo gros mtha' yas pa'i sdes
NK005(ca)016:1015: ts+aa 'dra rin chen brag gi dben khrod du bkod
